name: sap ZeuS next
short_description:
The electronic system of automation of processes (SAP) is created in order to improve organizational performance and accelerate the processes of interaction between the parts of the organization.
SAP should be in the form of network applications, while the entire database should be stored on a central server of the organization. All employees who have access to the SAP should be seized to set remote applications, and each employee dozhzhen have a client license. CALs must have variety, depending on the access level, these restrictions should be set depending on the employee access to sections of the SAP.
The main function of the SAP should be "control orders" with mandatory notification recipient.
As a consequence of filling in all forms of SAP employees, the system must generate reports for the head on the basis of related entries.
summary: Electronic system of process automation GC "Concord"
